headline: GE HealthCare Technologies Inc. (GEHC): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on GE HealthCare Technologies Inc. on Guardian Research’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on GEHC. GE HealthCare Technologies Inc.’s share was trading at $83.86 as of February 23rd. GEHC’s trailing and forward P/E were 15.74 and 16.69 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: GE HealthCare Teases 2027 Imaging Revenue Boost, Reaffirms 2026 Growth as Tariff Risks Loom
